channel.title: sillygwailo tweets

item.description: I’ll be in B.C. for an indefinite period starting in mid-August.

item.description: @toddsieling Is this tiny screenshot going to be not only comically expanded to fill the frame but also be cut off on both sides? Anyway, there’s also this. https://t.co/MRJlcw0dlH

item.description:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws

The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.
item.source:markdown:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws
The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.

item.description: @T0tallyn0tPr1me Ah, shit. That must have killed. With RTJ on stage. I wondered why they didn’t do a song together in the two shows I saw before that one.

item.description: I’ve decided to start using Clubhouse again.
item.source:markdown: I’ve decided to start using Clubhouse again.

item.description: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year, always wearing a mask.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year, always wearing a mask.

item.description: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but at the time I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but at the time I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year.

item.description: @fakehistoryhunt I love these. I hate the AI that makes fake still photos, but love the AI that creates these living portraits. Through these tweets, I realized I love Live Photos (Apple’s name for 2-second extremely short videos), which, I must say, I didn’t get the appeal of before your tweets.
item.source:markdown: @fakehistoryhunt I love these. I hate the AI that makes fake still photos, but love the AI that creates these living portraits. Through these tweets, I realized I love Live Photos (Apple’s name for 2-second extremely short videos), which, I must say, I didn’t get the appeal of before your tweets.

item.description: Covie is definitely ovie in Downtown Toronto.
item.source:markdown: Covie is definitely ovie in Downtown Toronto.

item.description: Just as reminder to myself, I̶ ̶w̶e̶a̶r̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶r̶y̶ ̶s̶i̶n̶g̶l̶e̶ ̶c̶h̶a̶i̶n̶,̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶n̶ ̶w̶h̶e̶n̶ ̶I̶'̶m̶ ̶i̶n̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶h̶o̶u̶s̶e̶ I don’t always have to explain myself.
item.source:markdown: Just as reminder to myself, I̶ ̶w̶e̶a̶r̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶r̶y̶ ̶s̶i̶n̶g̶l̶e̶ ̶c̶h̶a̶i̶n̶,̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶n̶ ̶w̶h̶e̶n̶ ̶I̶'̶m̶ ̶i̶n̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶h̶o̶u̶s̶e̶ I don’t always have to explain myself.

item.description:
Torontonians: Want to see some Icelandic bands for free tonight? https://t.co/tl6t5P53dY

It’s not very often that I get to see and hear a sound check. https://t.co/ur9yIRFbnA

This afternoon and evening. https://t.co/7K4DEz9XB8

All outdoor, free concerts with no barrier to entry, and which you’re guaranteed to get a seat at, are good. To read why, subscribe to my Substack.

Lindy was great, and even covered a song from Wings! https://t.co/27D7InPpKO

Tonight. https://t.co/F8iwDzPn0y

My view of Vōk from The Slip. https://t.co/vc6JjU5PmS

My view of Vök from The Slip. https://t.co/neApO7qBsL

My view of the incomparable Eivør. https://t.co/o1BXdbf9CL

Eivør’s cool, holy shit.

See Eivør live, and wait till the end. Trust me on this one.

Video I took of @GusGusOfficial at @HarbourfrontTO last night. That’s the way I’d dance if I thought only David Byrne was looking. https://t.co/V6xPD3hcxx

Two things that happened last night that I hadn’t seen before at a concert: One of the opening acts performed an encore. Huh? And the main act played more songs than they’d planned to because they had more time than they thought they did.

To celebrate how good the @eivormusic concert was on Saturday, I’ve replaced the only ‘o’ in my name with ‘ø’ (the name of which, I just learned, is the same as how it’s pronounced). https://t.co/FSZxpLIWdt
item.source:markdown:
Torontonians: Want to see some Icelandic bands for free tonight? https://t.co/tl6t5P53dY
It’s not very often that I get to see and hear a sound check. https://t.co/ur9yIRFbnA
This afternoon and evening. https://t.co/7K4DEz9XB8
All outdoor, free concerts with no barrier to entry, and which you’re guaranteed to get a seat at, are good. To read why, subscribe to my Substack.
Lindy was great, and even covered a song from Wings! https://t.co/27D7InPpKO
Tonight. https://t.co/F8iwDzPn0y
My view of Vōk from The Slip. https://t.co/vc6JjU5PmS
My view of Vök from The Slip. https://t.co/neApO7qBsL
My view of the incomparable Eivør. https://t.co/o1BXdbf9CL
Eivør’s cool, holy shit.
See Eivør live, and wait till the end. Trust me on this one.
Video I took of @GusGusOfficial at @HarbourfrontTO last night. That’s the way I’d dance if I thought only David Byrne was looking. https://t.co/V6xPD3hcxx
Two things that happened last night that I hadn’t seen before at a concert: One of the opening acts performed an encore. Huh? And the main act played more songs than they’d planned to because they had more time than they thought they did.
To celebrate how good the @eivormusic concert was on Saturday, I’ve replaced the only ‘o’ in my name with ‘ø’ (the name of which, I just learned, is the same as how it’s pronounced). https://t.co/FSZxpLIWdt

item.description: Sigh, it’s too hot today. #dlws https://t.co/ALEDB2Ee4R
item.source:markdown: Sigh, it’s too hot today. #dlws https://t.co/ALEDB2Ee4R

item.description:
I’m looking to increase the amount of time I spend volunteering at the end of August. I’m especially interested in working on with an organization that has an executive director and staff, with a path to being a board member myself.

I’m in the early phase of determining codifying what I believe in the most strongly and where I think I can help the most.

If I reach out directly about that, yes, I know it’s been a while. Let’s catch up and talk about what each of us can help each other with.

It’s either that or get a physical trainer.
item.source:markdown:
I’m looking to increase the amount of time I spend volunteering at the end of August. I’m especially interested in working on with an organization that has an executive director and staff, with a path to being a board member myself.
I’m in the early phase of determining codifying what I believe in the most strongly and where I think I can help the most.
If I reach out directly about that, yes, I know it’s been a while. Let’s catch up and talk about what each of us can help each other with.
It’s either that or get a physical trainer.

item.description: Today would have been a good day to open up the Lakeshore Boulevard Activeway. #ActiveTO
item.source:markdown: Today would have been a good day to open up the Lakeshore Boulevard Activeway. #ActiveTO

item.description: @CanadianMint I’m having trouble using your contact form. I’m getting “Failed to submit.” when I try to send anything. Is there an email address I can contact you at? I mainly just want to remove myself from the letter mail I get from you (and stay on the email list).
item.source:markdown: @CanadianMint I’m having trouble using your contact form. I’m getting “Failed to submit.” when I try to send anything. Is there an email address I can contact you at? I mainly just want to remove myself from the letter mail I get from you (and stay on the email list).

item.description:
I was in a movie and I had to stop watching the Blue Jays game when it was 3-0 for Toronto. Can someone tell me what happened after that?

The “Blue Jays in 30” jokes were fine, but they were all the same, and people could’ve searched Twitter and RTed the jokes that were already made.

Besides, all 28 runs could be shown in under 7 minutes. https://t.co/0T4VwShjK2
item.source:markdown:
I was in a movie and I had to stop watching the Blue Jays game when it was 3-0 for Toronto. Can someone tell me what happened after that?
The “Blue Jays in 30” jokes were fine, but they were all the same, and people could’ve searched Twitter and RTed the jokes that were already made.
Besides, all 28 runs could be shown in under 7 minutes. https://t.co/0T4VwShjK2
